data.title: Karlskrona Municipality Villa Vacation Rentals - Sweden
data.meta_description: Find the perfect villa rental for your trip to Karlskrona Municipality. Private villa rentals, luxury villa rentals, villa rentals with a pool, and villa rentals with a hot tub. Find and book unique villas on Airbnb.
data.text:
Villa in Bergkvara

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 17 reviews4.94 (17)

Newly renovated old church in the middle of the fields

This unique place has a style of its own. It is an old church that is completely newly renovated. High ceilings with large windows of light with a large terrace that makes it inside to outside. High quality of everything from building materials to furniture. This is a home for the extra picky who appreciate the beautiful and the peaceful. Here, a sense of calm comes in. Proximity to the sea, 30 minutes to Karlskrona, 35 minutes to Kalmar, the glass kingdom into the knots, picturesque Kristianopel a stone's throw away. Farm shops and cafe around the corner.

Villa in Sturkö

4.83 out of 5 average rating, 23 reviews4.83 (23)

House with sea view and jetty outside Karlskrona

Come and experience our amazing house. Enjoy the morning coffee with the sea sparkling outside. Fully equipped house with 3 bedrooms and bathroom. Large plot to enjoy or play on. Swimming at private dock 300 m from the house. Karlskrona can be reached in 20 minutes by car or commuter boat. Large awnings and AC provide comfortable temperature inside. Wifi, unlimited data. Bedding and towels are not included. Cleaning is done by the guest. Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with washing machine and dryer. Outdoor kitchen with sink, barbecue and roast stove.

Villa in Ramdala

4.78 out of 5 average rating, 9 reviews4.78 (9)

Villa with proximity to Golf and swimming area.

Dates 19-23/6 are rented only to family with children. No party room. Bring the whole family to this amazing place with lots of room for fun. 180m2 of living space. One bedroom with double bed, two bedrooms with 120cm bed as well as one bedroom with 90cm bed. There is also an inflatable mattress and travel bed(spjälsäng). Large dining table indoors, large patio with barbecue and dining area. 120m2 parking. Close to Golf, padel and swimming area. Choose from a bus or archipelago boat that will take you downtown Karlskrona.

Villa in Östra Ronneby

5 out of 5 average rating, 5 reviews5 (5)

Villa with patio and patios

Welcome to our villa! The family uses it as a leisure accommodation in amazing Blekinge, and we are now also renting it out. The house is located in a quiet residential area with ten minutes bicycle distance to Brunnsparken, Ronneby well, the station and city center. In ten minutes by car, you can get to the sea. By car, train, bus or bike, you can get to Karlskrona with its marine museum and world cultural heritage. Bed space for five people, but extra sleeping areas on sofa, daybed or mattress.

Villa in Nättraby

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 13 reviews4.92 (13)

Large child-friendly villa on a quiet dead-end street.

Large villa with lovely socializing areas. A floor house with several living areas, including a large playroom for children and young people. Three bedrooms on the top floor along with a newly renovated bathroom. There are extra beds in the TV room and a secluded bedroom in the bottom level. Large wind sheltered patio with nice plantings provides a cosy and calm framing. The west facing patio also has good barbecue possibilities. The garden also has a treehouse with a slide and trampoline.

Villa in Galgamarken-Trossö

4.89 out of 5 average rating, 9 reviews4.89 (9)

entire floor of a house

This spacious 3-bedroom apartment boasts a newly renovated shower and kitchen, ensuring a comfortable and modern stay for our guests. With 100 square meters of space, there's plenty of room for everyone to relax and unwind. Step out onto the balcony and be greeted by stunning views of the water, creating a serene backdrop for your morning coffee or evening unwind. Surrounding the property, you'll find beautiful water and forest views, perfect for leisurely strolls and reconnecting with nature.

Villa in Karlskrona S

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 18 reviews4.94 (18)

Seafront Villa with pool

The house is located in a calm environment with beautiful seaview and Karlskrona city center in the horizon. Stepping out from the living room leads to a patio and barbeque area in front of the pool area. Large pool from where you can overlook the sea, the garden with oaks and enjoy the sun. The house is approx. 180 m2 with 3 (4) bedrooms and open social area with the living room and kitchen in center. The area is family-friendly and close to nature and city. Child-friendly beach nearby.

Villa in Galgamarken-Trossö

5 out of 5 average rating, 8 reviews5 (8)

Villa Vikbo - Hästö - central island in Karlskrona

Unique 20th century villa on Hästö, a central island just outside Karlskrona. Secluded plot with patio and grill as well as trampoline and playhouse for the kids. Beach five min walk from the house. Open fireplace and tile oven. Two bedrooms inside the house plus a children's room with a crib for the smallest. On the property, there is a guest house with a double bed and small sofa bed. Garage drive with room for two cars as well as charging for electric car.

Villa in Galgamarken-Trossö

4.67 out of 5 average rating, 6 reviews4.67 (6)

Private villa on Hästö, 20 meters from the sea

Fantastic at attractive Hästö. House in the middle of Karlskrona archipelago. Close to everything and with a view that beats everything. A house for you who want that little extra. Shop and bus stop are within a few hundred meters. There are possibilities to rent bicycles, kayak and boat.

Villa in Karlskrona

4.85 out of 5 average rating, 47 reviews4.85 (47)

Two houses with seaview

Our house is located overlooking the sea and a sheltered bay. The garden is 2400 m2 with barbecue area and porch. Large oaks provide Beautiful shade areas in summer The Main house is 210 sqm with 3 bedrooms. The Smäller house is 25 sqm with a double bed and a small attic with 2 beds.
